verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We shall not all sleep, but we'll all be changed in a moment,
In a twinkling of an eye the last trumpet shall sound
And the dead shall be raised, incorruptible
And death and the grave are swallowed in victory,
And God, yes our God, shall fill all in all.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We are not without hope, not without hope, not without joy,
Not without power, not without praise, not without faith
Not without strength to finish this race.
Not without help, our help is the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Though there be battles and though there be loss
We're not afraid, we've counted the cost.
With the armour of God to the right and the left
Our Captain is Christ, our enemy, death.
And the saints of all time are cheering us on.
